text: Nancy A. Potok became the Chief Statistician of the United States in January, 2017.Nancy Potok Named Chief Statistician of the United States , American Statistical Association web site, Jan 2017 She had previously held management roles at the United States Department of Commerce, the University of Chicago's National Opinion Research Center, and at the United States Census Bureau during the 2000 Census of Population.
